Name: Chanbanger
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Hard to classify, a hint of Singapore Sling oriental cherry with some Cuban aged rum Daiquiri and a splash of Papa's grapefruit citrus sourness .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2014 by Barney Chan at The Mayor of Scaredy Cat Town in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Chanbanger contains 241 calories
